alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 15 at 9:29PM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Clayton and Grant Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
